workItems.title: Implement user authentication flow
workItems.description: Build the login form with email/password validation, implement OAuth integration, and wire up the authentication API endpoints.

workItems.title: Fix null pointer crash on settings page
workItems.description: Application crashes with null pointer exception when opening advanced settings without a loaded user profile. Need to add null checks and default values.

workItems.title: Add team filters to work items view
workItems.description: Extend the webview UI to include dropdown filters for team selection and iteration path, with state persistence across sessions.

workItems.title: Write integration tests for timer module
workItems.description: Comprehensive test coverage for timer stop flow, inactivity pause behavior, and time entry cap enforcement logic.

workItems.title: Polish Kanban card layout and styling
workItems.description: Improve card spacing, handle tag overflow gracefully, and ensure consistent visual hierarchy across all card states.

workItems.title: Implement drag-and-drop for Kanban columns
workItems.description: Enable drag-and-drop functionality to move work items between Kanban columns with visual feedback and optimistic updates.

workItems.title: Add support for custom work item fields
workItems.description: Allow users to configure and display custom fields from their Azure DevOps process template in the work items view.
